Zoë Paul bụ onye amụrụ na South Africa, onye na-akpụ ihe na onye na-ese ihe na Athens
Ọ na-ejikọta usoro ọdịnala na ngwaahịa nke mkpofu ụlọ ọrụ iji mee nyochaa obodo, ọrụ aka na ebe obibi.
Nne na nna Zoë Paul si South Africa bịa Gris n'oge ịkpa ókè nke agbụrụ
Paul, onye amụrụ n'afọ 1987 na South Africa, tolitere na United Kingdom na Gris, na ailand Kythira
N'ihi ụkọ ego ezinụlọ ya nwere n'oge ahụ, Paul mụtara otú e si arụ ọrụ na ihe dị iche iche mgbe ọ dị obere
Ọ gụrụ gbasara ihe ọkpụkpụ na Camberwell College of Arts, ebe ọ natara BA ya, na Royal College of Art na London, ebe ọ nwetara MA ya.
Paul na-eji ihe ọkpụkpụ, eserese, na ákwà iji chọpụta ebe obibi
Ọrụ ya sitere n'ike mmụọ nsọ karịsịa site na akara mgbagwoju anya n'etiti ime ụlọ na mpụga. Dị ka Paul bụ onye na-akpụ ihe a zụrụ azụ, ihe ọkpụkpụ Grik oge ochie emetụtawokwa nka ya.

Ihe ngosi nke Paul La Perma-Perla Kraal Emporium, nke na-enyocha nleta na obodo, emere na The Breeder gallery na Athens  na Spike Island Artspace na Bristol, UK. Akụkụ dị iche na ihe ngosi a bụ tebụl sárá asa ebe Paul kpọrọ ndị ọbịa ka ha sonyere ya na mkpụkọ ụrọ mgbe ọ na-aṅụ tii sage
ejikwa ụrọ  ahụ akpụkpọ akpụkọ bu mepụta ákwà mgbochi, nke bụ akụkụ nke ihe ngosi Paul ma bụrụ isiokwu na-emegharị ugboro ugboro n'ọrụ ya niile.
Mmekọrịta ya na onye Britain na-ese ihe  bu Faye Wei Wei , ihe ngosi Marzanna, Yours Again bụ nke emere na Hot Wheels Projects na Athens
Ihe ngosi a sitere na mkpali mmụọ site na akụkọ ifo nke ọwụwa anyanwụ Europe na omenala ọdịnala nke mmepụta ụmụ bebi iji kpọọ ọbịbịa nke oge opupu ihe ubi.
E tinyekwara ọrụ Paul na ihe ngosi Unorthodox na Jewish Museum (Manhattan) na ihe ngosi The Equilibrists na Benaki Museum na Athens.
